item.title: About
item.description: 👋 I love making and sharing things I have built with the world. 📚 Building Learn Anything, an open source website for learning any topic as fast as possible. 🖋 I love writing. You can read all the articles I wrote on Medium or take a look through my personal wiki where I share everything I know. 🌐 I share my thoughts on Twitter. I share my code on GitHub and you can see photos I took on Instagram.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I am currently making Learn Anything, sharing things, writing a wiki and blog and building ideas. My present and past projects include: Learn Anything Learn Anything is an open source website to learn any topic as fast as possible. I genuinely believe it can change the world for the better. Imagine a world where everyone knows what Internet is, what privacy is, what programming and computer science is and how to make computers do awesome things for you.

item.title: Likes
item.description: Animals Becoming conscious of the impact my decisions have on this planet and other living beings and eating only whole food plant based diet has been one of the best decisions I made thus far in my life. I think everyone has a choice nowadays of what they can eat and animal suffering can be avoided. Sharing I love sharing things I make and I am open about most things I do and like.

item.title: Now
item.description: I am currently making things in London. I have a shared calendar of places/events I plan to visit. Say 👋 if you are around.
